backend/entitlements.mo: Defines entitlement state and functions to check subscription or trial validity based on system time.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, access control, and entitlement lifecycle including trials and subscriptions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing removal of specific Settings UI elements with associated file and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and templates.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx with a default title and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app implementing order entry, line items, imports, settings, WhatsApp preview, and guidance sections.
frontend/src/components/EntitlementCallo: Empty file placeholder for entitlement access callout component.
frontend/src/components/EntitlementStatu: Empty file placeholder for entitlement status display component.
frontend/src/components/HelplineAction.t: Button component that displays a clickable helpline phone link when configured in settings.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Empty file placeholder for authentication button component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Empty file placeholder for first-time user profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/PublishSellGuida: Accordion-based guide explaining how to share or distribute the app via web link or app stores.
frontend/src/components/SettingsCard.tsx: Settings card allowing users to edit and save the helpline phone number with local state handling.
frontend/src/components/UpgradeSubscript: Empty file placeholder for subscription upgrade UI component.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppSendPrev: Modal showing a read‑only WhatsApp message preview, optional block alert, and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppSettings.ts: Manages app name and helpline phone settings with localStorage persistence and automatic document title updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useEntitlement.ts: Fetches entitlement state and exposes trial, subscription, and cancellation actions with derived access flags and messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useImportedLists.ts: Loads, saves, and clears imported party/item lists using localStorage with simple state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, handling login/logout, and exposing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls into React Query hooks for user profiles and entitlement actions with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/src/lib/entitlement.ts: Utilities to compute trial timing, expiration, and user‑facing entitlement messages from EntitlementState.
frontend/src/lib/importLists/parseImport: Provides utilities to parse CSV/XLSX files and extract unique party and item names with error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and typography settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versions, and records a feature request to remove specific UI elements.
